snippet: The NBC News/Facebook debate will be on "Meet the Press" on Sunday.
abstract: The NBC News/Facebook debate will be on "Meet the Press" on Sunday.
lead_paragraph: The primary season is off and running, with the Republican primary on Tuesday in New Hampshire and two debates this weekend. One debate, sponsored by NBC News and Facebook, will be on NBC's "Meet the Press" at 9 a.m. Sunday, broadcast from Concord, N.H.
